Toll Free Phone: 1.800.739.7367- Mon-Fri: 9:00am - 9:00pm to talk with a nurse- Call Mon-Fri: 9:00am - 4:30pm to book appointment
Service Details: - Provides confidential, nonjudgmental, youth-friendly, pro-choice, sex-positive sexual and reproductive health services for all genders, all orientations and all ages- Services include low-cost contraception, STI care, Pap screening, IUD insertions, pregnancy testing and pregnancy options counselling (please note:  services provided in each of our clinics are clinician dependent and may vary from clinic to clinic)- To make appointments, please call 1.800.739.7367, Mon-Fri: 9:00am - 4:30pm
Eligibility: - Welcomes new and returning clients- No referral necessary- Drop-in services for Plan B or pill pick-up- Appointments are required for IUD insertions and pap testing- Appointments are best for all other services, drop-in's welcome but on a first come/first served basis- Please note that drop-in spots fill up quickly.
Cost: - No fees for Clients with valid MSP coverage (this does not include contraceptive products)- Please note that the clinic is cash only
